name: Horn sounds
description:
Welcome to the tower defense game. You stand on the defense of the castle against the constantly approaching enemy forces.
Try your hand at the strategy genre where you have to fight for your lands.
You control small squads of fighters with different characteristics.
Some fight in close combat and have more health, others attack from afar and are very vulnerable.
Your task is to destroy all enemies on the map. Farms will supply you with provisions with which you can recruit new soldiers.
Gather squads, hire new soldiers, capture farms... All this will help you win!

-Dynamic gameplay
-Dangerous enemies
-Interesting gameplay
